mapper.insert: insert into jacg_warning (id, warningPosition, description, create_user, create_date, update_user, update_date, del, status) VALUES ( #{id}, #{warningPosition}, #{description} , #{createUser.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateUser.id}, #{updateDate}, '0', '0' );
mapper.select:
SELECT t1.id id, t1.warningPosition warningPosition, t1.`description` description, t1.status status
FROM jacg_warning t1
where t1.del!=1
and `warningPosition` like concat('%', #{warningPosition}, '%')
